en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Jakarta, 25th July 2009.
en.content:
REPORT BY INDONESIA COUNTRY LICENSEE’S PARTNER MR J. M. ANOWAR.

FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner held at Ciputra Hotel Jakarta on 25th July 2009 was a great success attended by many quality FE Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. Also attending was FE's Founder Director KS Lee together with Presidential Directors Rachel Thomas, Stanley Liew and Willy Toh. It was fantastic to note that 80% who attended were new members.

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Welcome Speech by FE's Indonesian Country Licensee’s Partner J M Anowar.
 
- Opening Speech by FE's Founder Director KS Lee.
   
- Motivational Speech by Presidential Director Rachel Thomas who as always captivated the crowd
with her electrifying enthusiasm!
   
- Interactive “On Stage Talk Show” with FE Spokespersons, Susi Susanti (World Singles Badminton Champion), Ade Rai (World Body Building Champion) and Chandra Wijaya (World Doubles Badminton Champion), moderated by well known TV presenter and talk show host Ferly Junandar.
   
- Product Demonstration by J M Anowar. All the first timers were very impressed by the power of FE's Quantum Pendant!
   
- Recognition Awards by KS Lee and Patrick Widjaya to new Presidential Directors Gino Lie and Saver, new Directors Hermawan, Eneng Lilianih and Riana Rahayu. There were 19 new Directors and 2 Presidential Directors for the month of May and June. Congratulations, FE Indonesia is really taking off!
   
- Songs, Kyokushin Karate Performance, Body Building Show and Aerobics/Fitness Dances.
   
- Lucky Draws for Early Birds.

A BIG THANK YOU to FE's Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja and his team for organizing the successful event. A BIG THANK YOU also to Ade Rai for his help in organizing the event and Ferly Junandar who did a great MC job and to all FE Leaders for supporting the event. AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!!
